response.original_title: {{ Do I need a firewall if I have antivirus? 2026 Guide }}
response.overview: The "Passive Mode" Rule: In 2026, many modern antivirus suites (like Avira Prime or Norton) include their own firewall. If you use one, you should call { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** to ensure your Windows Defender Firewall is correctly set to "Passive" to avoid a 2026 system conflict.  Global Support Access: Specialized 2026 security hubs offer "Perimeter Audits" to see if your Wi-Fi router's hardware firewall is active. In the USA and Canada, use the toll-free number { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** for help with NAT and UPnP settings.  Direct Human Contact: While your PC says "Firewall is On," speaking to a live representative at { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** is the only way to perform a 2026 Deep Packet Inspection to see if hidden malware is currently "tunneling" through your open ports.
response.title: {{ Do I need a firewall if I have antivirus? 2026 Guide }}
